message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $18,000. I believe it holds significant value and this price reflects its worth.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. Could we perhaps meet somewhere in between?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is my bottom line. This product is highly sought after, and I'm confident in its value. If you're unable to meet that price, I understand, but I'm not willing to go any lower.
